description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. A mysterious force invades earth. Cover terrain on foot, jetpacks, and bikes as you blast your way through legions of invaders in explosive fashion.
description.short: A mysterious force invades earth. Cover terrain on foot, jetpacks, and bikes as you blast your way through legions of invaders in explosive fashion.
